title: Energy (Windfall Gains in the Energy Sector) (Cap on Market Revenues) Act
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the Energy (Windfall Gains in the Energy
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the Energy (Windfall Gains in the Energy 

Sector) (Cap on Market Revenues) Act 2023 (Commencement) Order 2023.
text_norm: 1 order may cited energy (windfall gain energy sector) (cap market revenues) act 2023 (commencement) order 2023

title: Energy (Windfall Gains in the Energy Sector) (Cap on Market Revenues) Act
heading: 2. The 4th day of December 2023 is appointed as the day on which the
text_raw:
2. The 4th day of December 2023 is appointed as the day on which the 
Energy (Windfall Gains in the Energy Sector) (Cap on Market Revenues) Act 
2023 (No. 30 of 2023) shall come into operation. 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

1 December, 2023. 

EAMON RYAN, 

Minister for the Environment, Climate and 
Communications. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
"Iris Oifigiúil" of 5th December, 2023. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [590] 3
